程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.block.block.base

接口 ArtisanBaseBlock

所有已知子接口:
ArtisanCropBlock, ArtisanSimpleBlock
public interface ArtisanBaseBlock
Base interface for custom blocks, defining basic behaviors and properties for all custom blocks such as crops, machines, etc.

This interface is mainly used to manage transitions between block states and define common behaviors for block types.

Each custom block instance should be immutable. All state changes must be handled through ArtisanBlockData to ensure data consistency and persistence support.

另请参阅:
  • represents a specific block data instance in the world

  • 方法详细资料

    • getBlockId

      @NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey getBlockId()
      Gets the unique identifier of this custom block.

      This ID is used for persistent storage and cross-module references. It must be globally unique and remain unchanged during program execution.

      返回:
      an immutable namespaced key that serves as the unique identifier for the block

    • getState

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanBaseBlockState getState(int n)
      Gets the block state instance for the specified state value.

      State values are typically consecutive integers used to represent visual or logical change stages of the block, such as crop growth stages or machine working states.

      参数:
      n - state index (0 无效输入：'<'= n 无效输入：'<' getTotalStates())
      返回:
      the corresponding immutable state instance (fails silently, returns boundary value if out of range)

    • getTotalStates

      int getTotalStates()
      Gets the total number of states supported by this block.

      The total number of states determines the granularity of visual or logical changes of the block. Examples:

      • Regular block: usually 1 (only one state)
      • Growing crop: equals the number of growth stages (e.g., wheat has 8 stages)
      • Complex device: equals the number of all possible state combinations

      返回:
      a positive integer representing the total number of states the block has

    • getPlaceSoundProperty

      @Nullable @Nullable SoundProperty getPlaceSoundProperty()
      Gets the sound property played when placing the custom block.
      返回:
      the sound property object for the custom block placement sound, or null if not specified

    • getType

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanBlocks getType()
      Gets the type enum that this block belongs to.
      返回:
      the enum value representing the block type, not null

    • hasBlockEntity

      boolean hasBlockEntity()
      Checks whether this block has a block entity (BlockEntity).
      返回:
      true if the block has an associated block entity; false otherwise
